title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: In the Export Zip feature, updating the checkboxes should use a busy cursor.
OB: It takes a long time (around 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed during the update process.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Select the Export Zip option. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose some file types. 5. Press OK.
